objects.specification: A smooth, solid exhibition floor panel with a neutral light gray color and a slightly textured matte finish to provide a subtle non-reflective surface. It is sturdy and uniform in appearance, designed to support heavy equipment and vehicles. It covers the entire booth floor area seamlessly and integrates well with the overall modern exhibition style.

A tall exhibition wall panel with neutral light gray color and a matte finish, providing a clean and professional backdrop for displays. It has crisp rectangular edges and a sturdy construction, designed to support mounted banners and promotional materials. The surface is smooth with minimal texture, fitting a modern car exhibition environment.

A realistic demo car model with a sleek aerodynamic body design. It features a glossy paint finish, detailed wheels, headlights, and interior details visible through windows. The model represents a modern car exhibition centerpiece with meticulous attention to styling and surface quality.

A sleek, modern reception desk with a smooth matte finish and a clean rectangular form. The desk has a neutral white or light gray base color with subtle contrasting accent details. It features a generous flat countertop surface for visitor interaction and brochure display, with minimalistic and contemporary styling.

A compact display stand with a stable base and angled top surface to hold brochures or accessories. It has a modern geometric design, neutral light gray color with matte finish, and a subtle accent line or band for visual interest. The stand is sturdy and presents items at an accessible angle for viewers.

A small round exhibition table with a smooth, circular tabletop surface and a single central pedestal base. It is finished in a neutral dark gray matte color, with clean lines and minimalist styling. The table is sized appropriately for casual discussions and comfortable seating arrangements.

A modern exhibition chair with a sleek, minimalist design. It features a molded seat and back, neutral dark gray upholstery with a subtle fabric texture, and slender metal legs with a matte finish. The chair is lightweight yet sturdy, designed for visitor comfort and a contemporary aesthetic.

A large promotional banner featuring high-resolution car branding and imagery. It has vibrant printed graphics on a smooth, durable fabric or vinyl material, with bold colors and clean typography. The banner is designed for indoor use with a matte finish to reduce glare, fitting a modern car exhibition style.

A compact ceiling-mounted light fixture with a simple geometric housing. It has a white or off-white finish and a frosted diffuser for even light distribution. The fixture provides bright, consistent illumination, enhancing visibility of products below while maintaining a clean, modern aesthetic.

A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage. The leaves are broad and glossy, set in a simple neutral-colored pot with a matte finish. The plant adds a touch of organic warmth to the environment, complementing the modern interior styling.
